column20: Click [File] then [Make a copy...] to use the sheet for yourself.
column43:
Hide these columns. There should be no need to alter them (mostly).
Customization and homebrew are mostly handled by the Info pages.

column20: Check [?] for help.  And read all the notes!

column3: Right click and 'Insert note' to add details on any box.

column22: You can hide each level of spells individually by hiding the rows (on the left).
